about_the_game:
A 2D Strategic Base Defender game set in Medieval times. As relentless Waves of enemy forces threaten your Stronghold, you must gather Resources, Fortify your Defenses, and lead your Rebellion. Prepare to strengthen your Base and manage your Resources. But be aware of the Storms!

Step into the shoes of Elian, a brave young hero on a mission to defend his home village of Regera from relentless waves of enemy soldiers. Fight for peace and restore balance to the land. Find and gather resources, fortify your village with diverse defensive buildings, and strategically place them to outsmart your foes. But beware of the storms—they'll test your defenses and force you to adapt on the fly. Upgrade your buildings and unlock new ones. Show the enemies who is the boss and join Elian in an epic battle for Regera's future!

Explore the vibrant, dynamic, and immersive 2D world of Regera, uncovering its secrets as you clear the fog of war with each building you place. Gather vital resources: food, wood, stone, and gold to fortify and upgrade your stronghold and defend against the enemy onslaught. Shape your strategy and make every decision count as you build your path to victory. But don't try to memorize where resources stand since no two games have the same world. That's right world changes from round to round with different resources placements, enemy spawns weather conditions, and more.

Empower your attacks, use gold, upgrade buildings, unlock new ones and fight for Regera. As the game progresses enemies get stronger, nemeses come to challenge your heroes and armies grow larger!

On sunny days, workers are more productive, gathering extra resources to fuel your defenses. But beware the nights—your towers can't see far, and golems emerge from their hideouts, their glowing eyes casting fear over the villages. Storms can wreak havoc on your buildings and cripple resource production, adding yet another layer of challenge to your survival!
